name: El Houssine KHALIL
shortBio: Passionate about creating beautiful, functional, and user-friendly applications.
aboutParagraphs: I'm a passionate developer with a strong focus on creating intuitive and performant web applications. With several years of experience in the industry, I've developed a keen eye for detail and a commitment to writing clean, maintainable code.
When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or enjoying outdoor activities to maintain a healthy work-life balance.
availability: available for freelance work and Internship positions
footerTagline: Building digital experiences that make a difference
